name: Last Game Of The Decade 2019 (Last GOTD 2019)
name_original: Last Game Of The Decade 2019 (Last GOTD 2019)
description:
Hidden object game originally made for Glorious Trainwrecks, and a sequel to "Last GOTY 2018" (also included, but only uploaded to GT originally)

The game involves walking around finding photos and stickers, referencing my other works. It's a bit of an ego project but it was fun to just indulge myself that way.

It's a hidden object game, but with a few cool new additions from last year. You can collect music, there are more NPCs, quests, minigames, and special items to collect!
